54 enum
55 {
56  PROP_0,
57  PROP_FILTER_CAPS,
58  PROP_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE

61 #define DEFAULT_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE (GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_IMMEDIATE)
62 
63 static GstStaticPadTemplate sinktemplate = GST_STATIC_PAD_TEMPLATE ("sink",
64  GST_PAD_SINK,
65  GST_PAD_ALWAYS,
66  GST_STATIC_CAPS_ANY);
67 
68 static GstStaticPadTemplate srctemplate = GST_STATIC_PAD_TEMPLATE ("src",
69  GST_PAD_SRC,
70  GST_PAD_ALWAYS,
71  GST_STATIC_CAPS_ANY);

74 GST_DEBUG_CATEGORY_STATIC (gst_vivoecaps_debug_category);
75 #define GST_CAT_DEFAULT gst_vivoecaps_debug_category
76 
77 /* TODO: Add a drop-buffers mode */
78 #define GST_TYPE_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE (gst_caps_filter_caps_change_mode_get_type())
79 static GType
80 gst_caps_filter_caps_change_mode_get_type (void)
81 {
82  static GType type = 0;
83  static const GEnumValue data[] = {
84  {GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_IMMEDIATE,
85  "Only accept the current filter caps", "immediate"},
86  {GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED,
87  "Temporarily accept previous filter caps", "delayed"},
88  {0, NULL, NULL},
89  };
90 
91  if (!type) {
92  type = g_enum_register_static ("GstVivoeCapsCapsChangeMode", data);
93  }
94  return type;
95 }

97 #define _do_init \
98  GST_DEBUG_CATEGORY_INIT (gst_vivoecaps_debug_category, "vivoecaps", 0, \
99  "vivoecaps element");
100 #define gst_vivoecaps_parent_class parent_class
101 G_DEFINE_TYPE_WITH_CODE (GstVivoeCaps, gst_vivoecaps, GST_TYPE_BASE_TRANSFORM,
102  _do_init);

123 static void
124 gst_vivoecaps_class_init (GstVivoeCapsClass * klass)
125 {
126  GObjectClass *gobject_class;
127  GstElementClass *gstelement_class;
128  GstBaseTransformClass *trans_class;
129 
130  gobject_class = G_OBJECT_CLASS (klass);
131  gobject_class->set_property = gst_vivoecaps_set_property;
132  gobject_class->get_property = gst_vivoecaps_get_property;
133  gobject_class->dispose = gst_vivoecaps_dispose;
134 
135  g_object_class_install_property (gobject_class, PROP_FILTER_CAPS,
136  g_param_spec_boxed ("caps", "Filter caps",
137  "Restrict the possible allowed capabilities (NULL means ANY). "
138  "Setting this property takes a reference to the supplied GstCaps "
139  "object.", GST_TYPE_CAPS,
140  G_PARAM_READWRITE | GST_PARAM_MUTABLE_PLAYING |
141  G_PARAM_STATIC_STRINGS));
142 
143  g_object_class_install_property (gobject_class, PROP_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE,
144  g_param_spec_enum ("caps-change-mode", "Caps Change Mode",
145  "Filter caps change behaviour",
146  GST_TYPE_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE, DEFAULT_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE,
147  G_PARAM_READWRITE | GST_PARAM_MUTABLE_PLAYING |
148  G_PARAM_STATIC_STRINGS));
149 
150  gstelement_class = GST_ELEMENT_CLASS (klass);
151  gst_element_class_set_static_metadata (gstelement_class,
152  "VivoeCaps",
153  "Generic",
154  "Pass data without modification, limiting formats",
155  "David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>");
156  gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template (gstelement_class, &srctemplate);
157  gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template (gstelement_class, &sinktemplate);
158 
159  trans_class = GST_BASE_TRANSFORM_CLASS (klass);
160  trans_class->transform_caps =
161  GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_transform_caps);
162  trans_class->transform_ip = GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_transform_ip);
163  trans_class->accept_caps = GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_accept_caps);
164  trans_class->prepare_output_buffer =
165  GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_prepare_buf);
166  trans_class->sink_event = GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_sink_event);
167  trans_class->stop = GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_vivoecaps_stop);
168 }
169 
170 static void
171 gst_vivoecaps_init (GstVivoeCaps * filter)
172 {
173  GstBaseTransform *trans = GST_BASE_TRANSFORM (filter);
174  gst_base_transform_set_gap_aware (trans, TRUE);
175  gst_base_transform_set_prefer_passthrough (trans, FALSE);
176  filter->filter_caps = gst_caps_new_any ();
177  filter->filter_caps_used = FALSE;
178  filter->got_sink_caps = FALSE;
179  filter->caps_change_mode = DEFAULT_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE;
180 }
181 
182 static void
183 gst_vivoecaps_set_property (GObject * object, guint prop_id,
184  const GValue * value, GParamSpec * pspec)
185 {
186  GstVivoeCaps *vivoecaps = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (object);
187 
188  switch (prop_id) {
189  case PROP_FILTER_CAPS:{
190  GstCaps *new_caps;
191  GstCaps *old_caps;
192  const GstCaps *new_caps_val = gst_value_get_caps (value);
193 
194  if (new_caps_val == NULL) {
195  new_caps = gst_caps_new_any ();
196  } else {
197  new_caps = (GstCaps *) new_caps_val;
198  gst_caps_ref (new_caps);
199  }
200 
201  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
202  old_caps = vivoecaps->filter_caps;
203  vivoecaps->filter_caps = new_caps;
204  if (old_caps && vivoecaps->filter_caps_used &&
205  vivoecaps->caps_change_mode ==
206  GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED) {
207  vivoecaps->previous_caps =
208  g_list_prepend (vivoecaps->previous_caps, gst_caps_ref (old_caps));
209  } else if (vivoecaps->caps_change_mode !=
210  GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED) {
211  g_list_free_full (vivoecaps->previous_caps,
212  (GDestroyNotify) gst_caps_unref);
213  vivoecaps->previous_caps = NULL;
214  }
215  vivoecaps->filter_caps_used = FALSE;
216  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
217 
218  gst_caps_unref (old_caps);
219 
220  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "set new caps %" GST_PTR_FORMAT, new_caps);
221 
222  gst_base_transform_reconfigure_sink (GST_BASE_TRANSFORM (object));
223  break;
224  }
225  case PROP_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE:{
226  GstVivoeCapsCapsChangeMode old_change_mode;
227 
228  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
229  old_change_mode = vivoecaps->caps_change_mode;
230  vivoecaps->caps_change_mode = g_value_get_enum (value);
231 
232  if (vivoecaps->caps_change_mode != old_change_mode) {
233  g_list_free_full (vivoecaps->previous_caps,
234  (GDestroyNotify) gst_caps_unref);
235  vivoecaps->previous_caps = NULL;
236  }
237  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
238  break;
239  }
240  default:
241  G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec);
242  break;
243  }
244 }
245 
246 static void
247 gst_vivoecaps_get_property (GObject * object, guint prop_id, GValue * value,
248  GParamSpec * pspec)
249 {
250  GstVivoeCaps *vivoecaps = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (object);
251 
252  switch (prop_id) {
253  case PROP_FILTER_CAPS:
254  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
255  gst_value_set_caps (value, vivoecaps->filter_caps);
256  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
257  break;
258  case PROP_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE:
259  g_value_set_enum (value, vivoecaps->caps_change_mode);
260  break;
261  default:
262  G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec);
263  break;
264  }
265 }
266 
267 static void
268 gst_vivoecaps_dispose (GObject * object)
269 {
270  GstVivoeCaps *filter = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (object);
271 
272  gst_caps_replace (&filter->filter_caps, NULL);
273  g_list_free_full (filter->pending_events, (GDestroyNotify) gst_event_unref);
274  filter->pending_events = NULL;
275 
276  G_OBJECT_CLASS (parent_class)->dispose (object);
277 }
278 
279 static GstCaps *
280 gst_vivoecaps_transform_caps (GstBaseTransform * base,
281  GstPadDirection direction, GstCaps * caps, GstCaps * filter)
282 {
283  GstVivoeCaps *vivoecaps = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (base);
284  GstCaps *ret, *filter_caps, *tmp;
285  gboolean retried = FALSE;
286  GstVivoeCapsCapsChangeMode caps_change_mode;
287 
288  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
289  filter_caps = gst_caps_ref (vivoecaps->filter_caps);
290  vivoecaps->filter_caps_used = TRUE;
291  caps_change_mode = vivoecaps->caps_change_mode;
292  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
293 
294 retry:
295  if (filter) {
296  tmp =
297  gst_caps_intersect_full (filter, filter_caps, GST_CAPS_INTERSECT_FIRST);
298  gst_caps_unref (filter_caps);
299  filter_caps = tmp;
300  }
301 
302  ret = gst_caps_intersect_full (filter_caps, caps, GST_CAPS_INTERSECT_FIRST);
303 
304  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "input: %" GST_PTR_FORMAT, caps);
305  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "filter: %" GST_PTR_FORMAT, filter);
306  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "caps filter: %" GST_PTR_FORMAT,
307  filter_caps);
308  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "intersect: %" GST_PTR_FORMAT, ret);
309 
310  if (gst_caps_is_empty (ret)
311  && caps_change_mode ==
312  GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED && vivoecaps->previous_caps
313  && !retried) {
314  GList *l;
315 
316  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps,
317  "Current filter caps are not compatible, retry with previous");
318  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
319  gst_caps_unref (filter_caps);
320  gst_caps_unref (ret);
321  filter_caps = gst_caps_new_empty ();
322  for (l = vivoecaps->previous_caps; l; l = l->next) {
323  filter_caps = gst_caps_merge (filter_caps, gst_caps_ref (l->data));
324  }
325  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
326  retried = TRUE;
327  goto retry;
328  }
329 
330  gst_caps_unref (filter_caps);
331 
332  return ret;
333 }
334 
335 static gboolean
336 gst_vivoecaps_accept_caps (GstBaseTransform * base,
337  GstPadDirection direction, GstCaps * caps)
338 {
339  GstVivoeCaps *vivoecaps = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (base);
340  GstCaps *filter_caps;
341  gboolean ret;
342 
343  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
344  filter_caps = gst_caps_ref (vivoecaps->filter_caps);
345  vivoecaps->filter_caps_used = TRUE;
346  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
347 
348  ret = gst_caps_can_intersect (caps, filter_caps);
349  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (vivoecaps, "can intersect: %d", ret);
350  if (!ret
351  && vivoecaps->caps_change_mode ==
352  GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED) {
353  GList *l;
354 
355  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (vivoecaps);
356  for (l = vivoecaps->previous_caps; l; l = l->next) {
357  ret = gst_caps_can_intersect (caps, l->data);
358  if (ret)
359  break;
360  }
361  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (vivoecaps);
362 
363  /* Tell upstream to reconfigure, it's still
364  * looking at old caps */
365  if (ret)
366  gst_base_transform_reconfigure_sink (base);
367  }
368 
369  gst_caps_unref (filter_caps);
370 
371  return ret;
372 }
373 
374 static GstFlowReturn
375 gst_vivoecaps_transform_ip (GstBaseTransform * base, GstBuffer * buf)
376 {
377  /* No actual work here. It's all done in the prepare output buffer
378  * func. */
379  return GST_FLOW_OK;
380 }
381 
382 static void
383 gst_vivoecaps_push_pending_events (GstVivoeCaps * filter, GList * events)
384 {
385  GList *l;
386 
387  for (l = g_list_last (events); l; l = l->prev) {
388  GST_LOG_OBJECT (filter, "Forwarding %s event",
389  GST_EVENT_TYPE_NAME (l->data));
390  GST_BASE_TRANSFORM_CLASS (parent_class)->sink_event (GST_BASE_TRANSFORM_CAST
391  (filter), l->data);
392  }
393  g_list_free (events);
394 }
395 
396 /* Ouput buffer preparation ... if the buffer has no caps, and our allowed
397  * output caps is fixed, then send the caps downstream, making sure caps are
398  * sent before segment event.
399  *
400  * This ensures that caps event is sent if we can, so that pipelines like:
401  * gst-launch filesrc location=rawsamples.raw !
402  * audio/x-raw,format=S16LE,rate=48000,channels=2 ! alsasink
403  * will work.
404  */
405 static GstFlowReturn
406 gst_vivoecaps_prepare_buf (GstBaseTransform * trans, GstBuffer * input,
407  GstBuffer ** buf)
408 {
409  GstFlowReturn ret = GST_FLOW_OK;
410  GstVivoeCaps *filter = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (trans);
411 
412  /* always return the input as output buffer */
413  *buf = input;
414 
415  if (GST_PAD_MODE (trans->srcpad) == GST_PAD_MODE_PUSH
416  && !filter->got_sink_caps) {
417 
418  /* No caps. See if the output pad only supports fixed caps */
419  GstCaps *out_caps;
420  GList *pending_events = filter->pending_events;
421 
422  GST_LOG_OBJECT (trans, "Input pad does not have caps");
423 
424  filter->pending_events = NULL;
425 
426  out_caps = gst_pad_get_current_caps (trans->srcpad);
427  if (out_caps == NULL) {
428  out_caps = gst_pad_get_allowed_caps (trans->srcpad);
429  g_return_val_if_fail (out_caps != NULL, GST_FLOW_ERROR);
430  }
431 
432  out_caps = gst_caps_simplify (out_caps);
433 
434  if (gst_caps_is_fixed (out_caps) && !gst_caps_is_empty (out_caps)) {
435  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (trans, "Have fixed output caps %"
436  GST_PTR_FORMAT " to apply to srcpad", out_caps);
437 
438  if (!gst_pad_has_current_caps (trans->srcpad)) {
439  if (gst_pad_set_caps (trans->srcpad, out_caps)) {
440  if (pending_events) {
441  gst_vivoecaps_push_pending_events (filter, pending_events);
442  pending_events = NULL;
443  }
444  } else {
445  ret = GST_FLOW_NOT_NEGOTIATED;
446  }
447  } else {
448  gst_vivoecaps_push_pending_events (filter, pending_events);
449  pending_events = NULL;
450  }
451 
452  g_list_free_full (pending_events, (GDestroyNotify) gst_event_unref);
453  gst_caps_unref (out_caps);
454  } else {
455  gchar *caps_str = gst_caps_to_string (out_caps);
456 
457  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (trans, "Cannot choose caps. Have unfixed output caps %"
458  GST_PTR_FORMAT, out_caps);
459  gst_caps_unref (out_caps);
460 
461  GST_ELEMENT_ERROR (trans, STREAM, FORMAT,
462  ("Filter caps do not completely specify the output format"),
463  ("Output caps are unfixed: %s", caps_str));
464 
465  g_free (caps_str);
466  g_list_free_full (pending_events, (GDestroyNotify) gst_event_unref);
467 
468  ret = GST_FLOW_ERROR;
469  }
470  } else if (G_UNLIKELY (filter->pending_events)) {
471  GList *events = filter->pending_events;
472 
473  filter->pending_events = NULL;
474 
475  /* push pending events before a buffer */
476  gst_vivoecaps_push_pending_events (filter, events);
477  }
478 
479  return ret;
480 }
481 
482 /* Queue the segment event if there was no caps event */
483 static gboolean
484 gst_vivoecaps_sink_event (GstBaseTransform * trans, GstEvent * event)
485 {
486  GstVivoeCaps *filter = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (trans);
487  gboolean ret;
488 
489  if (GST_EVENT_TYPE (event) == GST_EVENT_FLUSH_STOP) {
490  GList *l;
491 
492  for (l = filter->pending_events; l; l = l->next) {
493  if (GST_EVENT_TYPE (l->data) == GST_EVENT_SEGMENT ||
494  GST_EVENT_TYPE (l->data) == GST_EVENT_EOS) {
495  gst_event_unref (l->data);
496  filter->pending_events = g_list_delete_link (filter->pending_events, l);
497  break;
498  }
499  }
500  }
501 
502  if (!GST_EVENT_IS_STICKY (event)
503  || GST_EVENT_TYPE (event) <= GST_EVENT_CAPS)
504  goto done;
505 
506  /* If we get EOS before any buffers, just push all pending events */
507  if (GST_EVENT_TYPE (event) == GST_EVENT_EOS) {
508  GList *l;
509 
510  for (l = g_list_last (filter->pending_events); l; l = l->prev) {
511  GST_LOG_OBJECT (trans, "Forwarding %s event",
512  GST_EVENT_TYPE_NAME (l->data));
513  GST_BASE_TRANSFORM_CLASS (parent_class)->sink_event (trans, l->data);
514  }
515  g_list_free (filter->pending_events);
516  filter->pending_events = NULL;
517  } else if (!filter->got_sink_caps) {
518  GST_LOG_OBJECT (trans, "Got %s event before caps, queueing",
519  GST_EVENT_TYPE_NAME (event));
520 
521  filter->pending_events = g_list_prepend (filter->pending_events, event);
522 
523  return TRUE;
524  }
525 
526 done:
527 
528  GST_LOG_OBJECT (trans, "Forwarding %s event", GST_EVENT_TYPE_NAME (event));
529  ret =
530  GST_BASE_TRANSFORM_CLASS (parent_class)->sink_event (trans,
531  gst_event_ref (event));
532 
533  if (GST_EVENT_TYPE (event) == GST_EVENT_CAPS) {
534  filter->got_sink_caps = TRUE;
535  if (filter->caps_change_mode == GST_VIVOE_CAPS_CAPS_CHANGE_MODE_DELAYED) {
536  GList *l;
537  GstCaps *caps;
538 
539  gst_event_parse_caps (event, &caps);
540 
541  /* Remove all previous caps up to one that works.
542  * Note that this might keep some leftover caps if there
543  * are multiple compatible caps */
544  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (filter);
545  for (l = g_list_last (filter->previous_caps); l; l = l->prev) {
546  if (gst_caps_can_intersect (caps, l->data)) {
547  while (l->next) {
548  gst_caps_unref (l->next->data);
549  l = g_list_delete_link (l, l->next);
550  }
551  break;
552  }
553  }
554  if (!l && gst_caps_can_intersect (caps, filter->filter_caps)) {
555  g_list_free_full (filter->previous_caps,
556  (GDestroyNotify) gst_caps_unref);
557  filter->previous_caps = NULL;
558  filter->filter_caps_used = TRUE;
559  }
560  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (filter);
561  }
562  }
563  gst_event_unref (event);
564 
565  return ret;
566 }
567 
568 static gboolean
569 gst_vivoecaps_stop (GstBaseTransform * trans)
570 {
571  GstVivoeCaps *filter = GST_VIVOE_CAPS (trans);
572 
573  g_list_free_full (filter->pending_events, (GDestroyNotify) gst_event_unref);
574  filter->pending_events = NULL;
575 
576  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (filter);
577  g_list_free_full (filter->previous_caps, (GDestroyNotify) gst_caps_unref);
578  filter->previous_caps = NULL;
579  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (filter);
580 
581  filter->got_sink_caps = FALSE;
582 
583  return TRUE;
584 }
585 
586 static gboolean
587 plugin_init (GstPlugin * plugin)
588 {
589  GST_DEBUG_CATEGORY_INIT (gst_vivoecaps_debug_category, "vivoecaps", 0, "vivoecaps");
590 
591  if (gst_element_register (plugin, "vivoecaps", GST_RANK_NONE,
592  GST_TYPE_VIVOE_CAPS))
593  return TRUE;
594 
595  return FALSE;
596 }
597 
598 gboolean
599 vivoecaps_init (void)
600 {
601 
602  return gst_plugin_register_static (GST_VERSION_MAJOR,
603  GST_VERSION_MINOR,
604  "vivoecaps",
605  "The Vivoe's gstreamer capsfilter module",
606  plugin_init,
607  VERSION,
